trend_summary: Across the sequence, construction concentrates in the eastern wedge: new housing blocks, light-industry and road interchanges spread around the airfield and main highway. The mountainous western two-thirds remain forested. Built area grows but still occupies a minority of the scene, shifting the locality from rural edge toward a low-rise suburban node.
notable_changes: Progressive expansion of residential estates east and southeast of the runway.
Widening and straightening of the north-south highway with additional interchanges.
New clusters of warehouses/light-industrial roofs near the highway junction.
Resurfacing and extension of airport aprons and taxiways.
Minor loss of tree cover along valley floors balanced by re-greening on some slopes.
